name: Space Danger: G.O.N.
description:
I made this game for the I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game (Again) game jam. My first project what i actually finished so do not expect too much :)

It contains some adult humorous elements, nothing major but just let you guys know.  Whatever is in the plot (see below) take with a hint of salt :P

For Windows and Linux.

Plot:

Join the adventures of Captain Jerk and his brave crew, as they facing the unspeakable dangers of the dark deep space. A beautiful and adventurous journey through space for one goal: Fix the Jump drive. 

Exploring, missions (well.........just 2 missions), shedloads of pew-pew, 3 different guns, 4 different races and etc....
